Registry of Open Data on AWS

Global Database of Events, Language and Tone (GDELT)

disaster response events

Description

This project monitors the world's broadcast, print, and web news from nearly every corner of every country in over 100 languages and identifies the people, locations, organizations, counts, themes, sources, emotions, quotes, images and events driving our global society every second of every day.

Update Frequency

Not currently being updated

License

http://www.gdeltproject.org/about.html#termsofuse

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    Project data files
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::gdelt-open-data
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://gdelt-open-data/ --no-sign-request
  • Description
    Notifications for new data
    Resource type
    SNS Topic
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:sns:us-east-1:928094251383:gdelt-csv
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
